Following orders from Governor Gracias Mi Amigo of Port Virtue Good, they hunted high
and low for the bandits of Isle de Cou, and found themselves face to face with a sandwich
worshipping cove of were-dolphin, the erg.
But the three captains of the Caribbean Royale kept their Isle de Cou, and rescued these fiends
from a life of thievery, to instead become a hearty crew of old-fashioned sea slaves.

out why until it hit them. Their toilet looked a lot like a guy they used to bully and figured
they should try to recover him from his untimely demise. But how? Well first they returned to
